item.title: Thrive Holdings斥资1亿美元押注人工智能助力IT支持
item.description:
这是Thrive Holdings公司为将新技术引入服务业所做的最新投资。

【原文：

It’s Thrive Holdings’ latest investment in bringing new tech to the services industry. 

】

item.title: 交易商密切关注贝森特任何债务出售动向以抑制收益率
item.description: 债券市场参与者普遍认为，美国财政部在周三的关键声明中不会对债务发行计划作出重大调整。不过，特朗普政府在其他领域采取的激进财政举措，已使投资者保持警惕，防范任何压低收益率的意外举措。【原文：Bond market participants widely see the US Treasury refraining from any major shift in debt-issuance plans in a key statement Wednesday, though the Trump administration’s aggressive financial maneuvers elsewhere have put investors on watch for any surprise move to hold down yields.】

item.title: 智利投资者预期三月降息及收益率曲线陡峭化
item.description: 投资者押注智利货币当局将在3月下次政策会议上降息25个基点，此时距离新政府上台仅两周——该政府已承诺重振经济增长。【原文：Investors are betting Chile’s monetary authority will reduce interest rates by a quarter-point at the next policy meeting in March, two weeks after a new government comes to power that has pledged to reinvigorate economic growth.】

item.title: 高盛分析师斯奈德称美国企业盈利预测表现强劲
item.description: 高盛集团策略师指出，美国企业2026年的盈利前景依然稳健，这缓解了市场对当前财报季表现欠佳的担忧。【原文：Corporate America’s earnings outlook for 2026 remains solid, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists, assuaging concerns after an underwhelming reporting season so far.】

item.title: 意联银行通过欧洲扩张计划新聘员工以提升财富管理业务
item.description: 意联银行（Intesa Sanpaolo SpA）概述了在欧洲拓展财富管理业务的步骤，这是首席执行官卡洛·梅塞纳（Carlo Messina）提升手续费收入计划的一部分。【原文：Intesa Sanpaolo SpA outlined steps to expand its wealth management business across Europe as part of a plan by Chief Executive Officer Carlo Messina to boost fee income.】

item.title: 埃及新首都开通首条国际航线
item.description: 埃及新行政首都开通首条国际航线，为这项雄心勃勃的巨型工程注入新动力。该项目旨在缓解拥挤不堪的历史名城开罗的压力。【原文：Egypt’s new administrative capital got its first international flight connection, a boost for the ambitious megaproject that seeks to ease pressure on congested historic Cairo.】

item.title: 金属狂潮遭遇痛苦考验，恰逢"及时行乐"人群蜂拥而入
item.description: 金属和矿业股票的火爆交易正在崩溃，恰逢大批散户投资者开始涌入。【原文：The red-hot trade in metals and mining stocks is crumbling just as droves of individual investors began piling in.】

item.title: 戴蒙、精准对冲基金创下2020年以来最佳月度回报
item.description: 亚洲股市大涨后，戴蒙亚洲资本和Pinpoint资产管理有限公司的对冲基金创下数年来的最大月度涨幅。【原文：Hedge funds of Dymon Asia Capital and Pinpoint Asset Management Ltd. posted their biggest monthly gains in years after Asian stocks surged.】

item.title: TDK受中国稀土出口限制影响，寻求替代方案
item.description: TDK公司表示，中国对稀土出口实施更严格的管制，正使材料采购面临严峻挑战，凸显出依赖关键矿产的日本制造商面临日益加剧的供应链风险。【原文：TDK Corp. said tighter Chinese export controls on rare earths are creating a challenging environment for materials procurement, underscoring growing supply-chain risks for Japanese manufacturers dependent on critical minerals.】

item.title: 建筑供应商收益受美国政府停摆及风暴缓解影响
item.description: 美国建筑材料供应商强劲的盈利表现可能遭遇挫折，因政府停摆及缺乏强风暴摧毁屋顶的灾害，导致第四季度需求受阻。【原文：Construction material suppliers’ strong earnings performance in the US probably faced a setback as the government shutdown and a lack of storms blowing off roofs stymied demand in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚民众在佩特罗访美前夕情绪紧张
item.description: 哥伦比亚民众本周对总统古斯塔沃·佩特罗访问白宫感到忐忑不安，担心他当面激怒唐纳德·特朗普的程度可能不亚于他在网络上的言论。【原文：Colombians are on edge ahead of President Gustavo Petro’s visit to the White House this week over fears that he might antagonize Donald Trump as much in the flesh as he has done online.】

item.title: 法国财政状况正逐步改善，国家赤字持续缩小
item.description: 法国报告称，中央政府财政赤字已缩小至新冠疫情以来的最低水平，表明该国有望实现甚至超越其财政目标。【原文：France reported the narrowest gap in the central state’s finances since the Covid pandemic, indicating the country is on track to meet or even surpass its fiscal targets.】

item.title: 人民币兑美元互换助力肯尼亚削减1.67亿美元债务成本
item.description: 肯尼亚向中国偿还的债务减少了三分之一以上，此前该国将一项铁路项目美元贷款转换为人民币贷款，为深陷债务泥潭的经济体提供了喘息之机。【原文：Kenya’s debt repayments to China fell by more than a third after the conversion of dollar loans for a railway project into yuan, offering reprieve for the economy struggling with mounting liabilities.】

item.title: 波兰计划时隔两年重返日本债券市场
item.description: 波兰时隔两年重返日本债券市场，计划发行多期武士债券以满足日益增长的融资需求。【原文：Poland is returning to the Japanese bond market after two years away with a planned multi-tranche Samurai issue to fund its growing borrowing needs.】

item.title: 阿联酋航空准备在暂停两年后重启以色列航线
item.description: 阿联酋航空正准备重启飞往特拉维夫的航班，结束因以色列与中东敌对国家战争而中断的两年停航期。【原文：Emirates is preparing to resume flights to Tel Aviv, ending a two-year hiatus prompted by wars between Israel and its enemies in the Middle East.】

item.title: 英国工厂创17个月最强劲增长，PMI数据显示
item.description: 一项备受关注的调查显示，英国制造业迎来了工党执政以来的最佳月份之一，表明该行业正在摆脱增税和地缘政治动荡的影响。【原文：British manufacturers had one their best months since Labour came to power, according to a closely watched survey that suggests the sector is shaking off the impact of tax rises and geopolitical turbulence.】

item.title: 沙特王储穆罕默德·本·萨勒曼推出多项改革措施以吸引更多外国直接投资
item.description: 短短数月间，沙特阿拉伯冻结了租金，向外国人开放了房产所有权，放宽了酒类法规，并向全球投资者开放了其股票市场。【原文：In a matter of months, Saudi Arabia has frozen rents, opened property ownership to foreigners, relaxed liquor laws and freed its stock market to investors everywhere.】

item.title: 那位称数据中心需求故事说不通的公用事业分析师
item.description:
公用事业公司建造的发电能力可能是实际需求的两倍。

【原文：

Utilities may be building twice as much power as needed.

】

item.title: 南非工厂情绪好转，因本地需求激增
item.description: 受本地需求改善推动，南非制造业信心指数在1月份攀升至三个月高点。【原文：Sentiment among South African manufacturers climbed to a three-month high in January, driven by improving local demand.】

item.title: 零散股：数据中心需求故事难以自圆其说（播客）
item.description: 随着人工智能为能源行业注入活力，公用事业分析师正迎来高光时刻。预计到2030年，为满足所有新建数据中心的用电需求，将额外需要94吉瓦的电力。投资者采取"铁锹与铁镐"策略，使能源投资成为热门领域。 但一位资深分析师指出——从公用事业角度看——我们已准备好将产能超额建设至实际需求的两倍。本期节目中，投资级信用业务联席主管兼公用事业与电力部门主管安迪·德弗里斯将深入探讨这一观点。【原文：Utilities analysts are having a moment as the energy sector gets a boost from AI. With an extra 94 gigawatts forecast to be needed by 2030 to power all these new data centers, energy investment has become a hot play as investors take a “picks and shovels” approach. But one long-time analyst says that — from a utilities perspective — we’re already set to overbuild capacity by twice as much as is needed. On this episode, Andy DeVries, co-head of investment grade credit and head of utilities and po】

item.title: 中部电力制定核电重启策略应对不确定性
item.description: 中部电力公司正在制定一项新的中期经营计划，旨在应对其核心核电站重启的不确定性，因潜在违规行为使该设施的前景蒙上阴影。【原文：Chubu Electric Power Co. is drafting a new midterm management plan designed to withstand uncertainty over the restart of its key nuclear power plant as potential misconduct clouds the facility’s outlook.】

item.title: 新加坡人争相逢低买入黄金，尽管金价暴跌
item.description: 尽管金价暴跌，周一新加坡民众仍排队购买黄金，这彰显出贵金属零售需求的非凡韧性。【原文：People were still queuing up to buy gold in Singapore on Monday even as prices plummeted, showing the extraordinary resilience in retail demand for precious metals.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空管理局支持特朗普就飞机认证问题对加拿大发起的攻击
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局表示，预计其他国家的航空当局将接受其认证。此前，美国总统特朗普就湾流喷气机的认证问题向加拿大发出威胁。【原文：The US Federal Aviation Administration said it expects other countries’ aviation authorities to accept its certifications, as President Donald Trump threatens Canada over certification of Gulfstream jets.】

item.title: 阿布扎比投资局寻求26亿美元贷款
item.description: 知情人士透露，主权财富基金阿布扎比投资局正寻求一笔37.5亿澳元（约合26亿美元）的贷款，该贷款由其全资子公司持有的四项澳大利亚资产作为抵押。【原文：Sovereign wealth fund Abu Dhabi Investment Authority is seeking an A$3.75 billion ($2.6 billion) loan backed by four Australian assets held by the firm’s wholly-owned subsidiary, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亚洲十年高位保证金水平有助于解释抛售强度
item.description: 自全球金融危机以来，股票交易中使用的保证金债务达到最高水平，这为解释为何亚洲股市在贵金属抛售后暴跌提供了线索。【原文：The highest levels of margin debt used to buy stocks since the global financial crisis offers a clue as to why Asian shares tumbled following a selloff in precious metals.】

item.title: 瑞银集团任命前瑞士金融市场监管局局长加入董事会，此时正值监管机构对其展开调查
item.description: 宝盛集团有限公司提名瑞士金融市场监管局前首席执行官乌尔班·安格恩加入其董事会，在瑞士监管机构仍在对其展开调查之际，此举将增强该治理机构的监管专业能力。【原文：Julius Baer Group Ltd. nominated former Finma Chief Executive Officer Urban Angehrn to join its board of directors, strengthening regulatory expertise on the governance body while it’s still being probed by the Swiss watchdog.】

item.title: 阿斯利康股票将在美国开始交易，此前其上市地位已获提升
item.description: 英国最大制药商阿斯利康公司股票将于周一在纽约证券交易所开始交易，此前该公司进行了上市升级，以取代其在纳斯达克上市的美国存托凭证。【原文：Shares of AstraZeneca Plc, the UK’s biggest drugmaker, will start trading on the New York Stock Exchange on Monday following a listing upgrade to replace its American Depositary Receipts that were on Nasdaq.】

item.title: 印度提高交易税后，高频交易商面临利润挤压
item.description: 印度高频交易商正为收益下滑做准备，此前政府提议提高股票衍生品的税率，此举旨在遏制全球最繁忙期权市场中的投机活动。【原文：High-frequency traders in India are bracing for weaker returns after the government proposed higher taxes on equity derivatives, a move aimed at curbing speculative activity in the world’s busiest options market.】

item.title: 南非股市创2020年3月以来最大跌幅，金属股领跌
item.description: 南非股市创下2020年3月以来最大跌幅，与持续走低的贵金属同步下挫。【原文：South African stocks tumbled the most since March 2020, falling along with precious metals that are extending losses.】

item.title: 日本免税店销售下滑幅度扩大，中日紧张局势持续发酵
item.description: 日本顶级百货商店的免税销售额在1月份再次下滑，凸显出中日紧张关系正如何损害零售业——中国游客的缺席造成了显著影响。【原文：Duty-free sales at Japan’s top department stores fell again in January, underscoring how tensions with China are hurting the retail sector as Chinese tourists stay away.】
